title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: The report designer is not rejecting invalid date/time strings entered in the 'defaultvalue' field of a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
EB: The report designer should reject invalid date/time strings entered in the 'defaultvalue' field of a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new 'DateTime' type report parameter.
3. In the 'defaultvalue' field of the parameter, type an invalid date string, for example, '55/66/9999'.
